# R requirements for the tests are in R_requirements_tests.txt
numpy>=1.15.0
sempler>=0.2.0
# For CDT
# The installation of pytorch might be different in your system
-f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/torch_stable.html
torch==1.7.0+cpu
torchvision==0.8.1+cpu
torchaudio==0.7.0
cdt==0.5.21

# Note: must access the directory where cdt is installed and in
#  ./causality/graph/R_templates/ges.R, add the argument iterate=FALSE
#  to the call to ges, i.e. pcalg::ges(...)
